content: X-P B4 MX Concrete nails (collated) High-performance collated nails for fastening to concrete and other base materials using the BX 4 cordless nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-performance nail for soft and some tough concrete Long, conical tip and high hardness â€“ for excellent fastening quality Applications Fastening to soft and some tough concrete Fastening to solid masonry Fastening to filled block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 2-3/8 in Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 2-3/8 in | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Fastener shank diameter | 1/8 in | For use with (tools) | BX 4 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2361655 - High performance nail X-P 17 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc - 3922902 - 1/2 pallet BULK 120K X-P 17 B4 MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 120000x High performance nail X-P 17 MX B4 - 2361656 - High performance nail X-P 20 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc - 3923003 - 1/2 pallet BULK 108K X-P 20 B4 MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108000x High performance nail X-P 20 MX B4 - 2361657 - High performance nail X-P 24 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc
